targets.uql:
parse-json
| scope "results"
| extend "datetime"=todatetime("t")
| extend "datetime"=startofday("datetime")
| summarize "total"=sum("v.v") by "datetime"
| extend "date"=todatetime("datetime")
| project "date", "Inner"=tonumber("total")

| scope "results"
| extend "datetime"=todatetime("t")

| extend "date"=todatetime("datetime")
| project "date", "Outer"=tonumber("total")

| project "date", "Remainder"=tonumber("total")
